title: Unable connect to login queue for a few days
body:
The past week or so I've had to deal with the "Unable to connect to login queue" error, i basically have to spam the login button until it randomly lets me in. 
I tried most of riot's suggested solutions, but none seem to fix it.

replies.body: This can happen with an unstable connection or block failing to reach the matchmaking service.  If this is still happening, I recommend going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix up any of that instability.  I suggest downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to auto-configure your firewall settings.  Let me know if that helps.

Wow having this problem right now trying to login to client, then had it right now when I had to login to try and post a reply haha. Must be something going on with league authentication/login servers? 

I wasn't having this problem a couple days ago when I last logged in? Just started now for me.

Edit: HMM I was just able to login to client after a couple failed attempts.
